DOC.criteria: Nonsmoker smoker ≤ 3 cigarettes/day Nonpregnant nonbreastfeeding Serum ferritin < 30ng/mL Haemoglobin ≥11g/dL Amenorrhea Menopause Any known health problem likely influence iron status include ironmetabolismrelated disease ( iron deficiency anaemia , thalassaemia , haemochromatosis ) Chronic gastric disease ( inflammatory bowel disease , Crohn disease , gastric ulcer , celiac disease , hemorrhagic disease ) Renal disease allergy component assay diary product .
